_This strtofy parameter makes a spolit so that te proportion of values in the sample produced will be tha same as the propotion of values provided to parameter stratify._

_For example, if variable "y" is binary categorical variable with value 0 and 1 and there are 25%  of zeros and 75% of ones, stratify = y will make sure that your random split has 25% of 0´s and 75% of 1´s._

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stack_Overflow
